data.comment: The match is underway. Watford have kicked-off.
William Troost-Ekong for Watford has been booked by Matt Donohue and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 6, Goal! Alex Mowatt gives Barnsley a 1-0 lead.
The first-half is over at Oakwell Ground.
The second-half has commenced. Barnsley with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Clarke Oduor is replacing Callum Brittain for the home team.
George Miller is on a sub for Patrick Schmidt for Barnsley.
Vladan Ivic is making the team's first substitution at Oakwell Ground with James Garner replacing Nathaniel Chalobah.
In the minute 73, Valerien Ismael (Barnsley) is making a third substitution, with Herbie Kane replacing Matty James.
The away team replace William Troost-Ekong with Andre Gray.
Watford make their third substitution with Will Hughes replacing Tom Cleverley.
In the minute 82, Callum Styles (Barnsley) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
